name: Ginecology
description: Gynaecology or gynecology (see spelling differences) is the medical practice dealing with the health of the female reproductive system.

name: Pediatrics
description: Paediatrics is the branch of medicine that involves the medical care of infants, children, and adolescents. The American Academy of Pediatrics recommends.

name: Neurology
description: Neurology is the branch of medicine concerned with the study and treatment of disorders of the nervous system. The nervous system is a complex, sophisticated system that regulates and coordinates body activities. It has two major divisions: Central nervous system: the brain and spinal cord.

name: Odontology
description: Forensic odontologists are highly experienced, specially trained dentists who use their expertise to help identify unknown remains and trace bite marks to a specific individual. The forensic odontologist may be called in to do so by police officers, the medical examiner or the coroner.

name: Laboratory
description: A laboratory is a facility that provides controlled conditions in which scientific or technological research, experiments, and measurement may be performed.
